org.biojava3.phylo

Class TreeConstructor<C extends org.biojava3.core.sequence.template.AbstractSequence<D>,D extends org.biojava3.core.sequence.template.Compound>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.biojava3.phylo.TreeConstructor<C,D>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TreeConstructor<C extends org.biojava3.core.sequence.template.AbstractSequence<D>,D extends org.biojava3.core.sequence.template.Compound>
extends java.lang.Thread
    Tree constructor uses the forrester tree library to build phylogenetic trees using neighbor joining algorithm. The distance matrix is calculated using code from JalView.
    Author:
    Scooter Willis
